response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $12,000. Considering its quality and the importance it holds for you, I am offering it to you for $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire something truly valuable at a price slightly below its perceived worth. I look forward to hearing your decision soon.", "product_price": 11500}
